dict.string: en
Fitness Companion
$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)
$(PRODUCT_NAME)
APPL
$(MARKETING_VERSION)
$(CURRENT_PROJECT_VERSION)
LaunchScreen
Main
This app requires camera access to take photos for your profile and progress tracking
This app requires access to save photos to your library
This app requires access to your photos to upload profile pictures and progress images
This app requires location access to track your workout routes and find nearby fitness facilities
This app requires location access to track your workouts and fitness activities even when the app is in the background
This app requires location access to track your workouts and fitness activities
This app requires motion data access to track your physical activities and step count
This app requires access to your health data to display comprehensive fitness information
This app requires permission to write fitness data to Apple Health
This app requires microphone access for voice commands during workouts
This information is used to deliver personalized fitness content and improve your workout experience
This app needs access to your calendar to schedule workouts and fitness events
This app needs access to your contacts to find friends for workout sharing
This app needs access to your reminders to set workout reminders
This app needs access to your music to create workout playlists
This app uses speech recognition to enable voice commands during workouts
This app uses Bluetooth to connect to fitness devices and sensors
This app uses Bluetooth to connect to fitness tracking devices
This app requires motion data to track your fitness activities and step count
